name: BuzzBall (Squidney)
description:
You are Bree, a highly competitive Bee participating in the annual BuzzBall tournament. 

The goal is to knock off all the opposing grubs above you.  Your only means of doing so is to hit them with the Buzzball itself. Be careful though, Grubs are sore losers and will try to take you down with them upon defeat. Dodge em, smack em, or juggle them! What ever floats your boat. 

The game features two playable characters, Bree and Hornet, both with their own unique special move. 

This is my first game so it may be a bit rough around the edges. It was made as an assignment for my  game design class.  I hope you enjoy it!
